recommendations.excerpt: From helping you to focus more to improving sports performance, some scientists believe 'depositing' sleep for later use can bring a range of benefits.

recommendations.title: How to Recharge Your Social Battery, According to Therapists
recommendations.excerpt: Because nothing drains you faster than hours of smiling and small talk.

recommendations.title: In the bustle of the city, we need more pockets of serenity
recommendations.excerpt: Stillness shouldn’t be something you only find in nature. Well-designed urban spaces can be good for the nervous system, too

recommendations.title: Society Needs A Doctor’s Prescription For Nature
recommendations.excerpt: Long treated as a backdrop to human life, the trees, babbling streams and rolling hills of the natural world could actually help repair society’s fraying social fabric.

recommendations.title: A Reading Journal Won’t Make You Smarter, but It Will Make You More Mindful
recommendations.excerpt: Papier’s reading journal is the low-tech way I made reading feel calmer and more intentional – and you don’t need to love reading to benefit from it
